caller_intent: The caller is inquiring about walk-in availability, waiting times, pricing, and payment methods for a haircut and beard trim service.
resolution_steps: Agent confirms walk-in availability and discusses waiting times (10-15 minutes vs. 30 minutes).
Agent states the price for the service ($20) and clarifies payment is cash-only.
Caller agrees to a 20-minute wait and confirms the appointment time (1 o'clock) and name (Joe).
summary: A caller inquired about haircut and beard trim services at a salon, including availability, waiting times, and payment options. The agent provided details about pricing ($20 cash-only) and confirmed a 1 o'clock appointment with the caller named Joe. The call concluded with the caller agreeing to arrive in 20 minutes.
